import{useMemo}from'react';import{kebabCase}from'lodash';import{toastTypes}from'waltor-uikit';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{push as pushToast,remove as removeToast,clear as clearToast}from'state/actions';// Toasts
var useToast=function useToast(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var helpers=useMemo(function(){var push=function push(toast){return dispatch(pushToast(toast));};return{toastError:function toastError(title,description){return push({id:kebabCase(title),type:toastTypes.DANGER,title:title,description:description});},toastInfo:function toastInfo(title,description){return push({id:kebabCase(title),type:toastTypes.INFO,title:title,description:description});},toastSuccess:function toastSuccess(title,description){return push({id:kebabCase(title),type:toastTypes.SUCCESS,title:title,description:description});},toastWarning:function toastWarning(title,description){return push({id:kebabCase(title),type:toastTypes.WARNING,title:title,description:description});},push:push,remove:function remove(id){return dispatch(removeToast(id));},clear:function clear(){return dispatch(clearToast());}};},[dispatch]);return helpers;};export default useToast;
